name: WP Login Notice
author: Satoshi Yoshida

sections.description: Someone will be notified by e-mail After logging.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the wp-login-notice folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
0.1.0

Create new.

0.2.0

Add From address.

1.0.0

Stable version release.

1.1.0

Modified to delete the information of the plug-in from the DB during the uninstallation.

1.2.0

Add setting of monitored authority and monitored exclusion user.

1.3.0

Add setting of ip address and host name.

1.3.1

Tested on WordPress 4.9.4.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the wp-login-notice folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
